Name: Internal Segement - Acrobat Expanded to PMBU
Expression: {    TM1FILTERBYLEVEL( {TM1DRILLDOWNMEMBER( {TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Profit Center] )}, "all profit centers")}, ALL, RECURSIVE )}, 2) ,    TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Profit Center] )}, "10800") ,    TM1FILTERBYPATTERN( {TM1SUBSETALL( [Profit Center] )}, "13700") }
